title: Hamilton Beach Countertop Toaster Oven & Pizza Maker Large 4-Slice Capacity, Stainless Steel (31401)
description: Our Hamilton Beach small toaster ovens are the ultimate in kitchen convenience. This handy appliance will toast, broil, or bake all of your favorite foods for your busy lifestyle. And a compact toaster over takes up less counter space making it great for a small kitchen or work area. Pull out crumb tray for easy cleanup.
